method: LLM-as-a-Judge (outcome relevance + correctness vs expected behavior)

cases.rationale: Returned real production topology with host details and correct non-approval execution.
Mapped to queue target correctly; environment has zero queue rows so explicit empty-state response is correct.
Returned live recent production events and correct read-only execution behavior.
Returned concrete lookup table content for ErrorCodes from live IRIS data.
Expected class metadata retrieval, but operation failed with IRIS 404 and no action target. Outcome not functionally correct.
Invocation policy was read and rendered with mode and argument limit.
Class package pattern query resolved to dictionary/classes and returned relevant NHSTIE2 class list.
Dry-run add host executed as non-mutating preview with explicit dry-run confirmation.
Non-dry-run host add correctly required approval and produced a pending action plan.
Dry-run remove host executed with explicit no-change confirmation.

recommendedFixes.action: Investigate IRIS /ai/operate handler for target classmeta/<ClassName> in deployed namespace and ensure latest Dispatcher class is imported/compiled.
